## Course Overview

<br>
[<img src="https://rockefelleruniversity.github.io/RU_VisualizingGenomicsData/workflows/R-CMD-check-bioc/badge.svg">](https://rockefelleruniversity.github.io/RU_VisualizingGenomicsData/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check-bioc)


This course introduces the Genomic visualisation using Bioconductor.



In the first sessions we will cover the visualisation of genomic loci as tracks using Gviz.

In the second sessions we will review methods to simultaneously  visualise multiple loci across groups and/or conditions.
